name: Volk-san: Egg&Catch
description:
Volk-san: Egg&Catch

Hello! What you're looking at is a very tiny, cute, and rather fast-paced game about an egg-loving wolf catching eggs. Please, join her!!

This game features 10 stages that, after some practice, last about 5 minutes altogether, and endless mode with an offline scoreboard... An optional LCD effect, character suits, and a cool but fairly useless manual. That's about it. Tiny, right?

Linux & advanced Mac users: for time being, the game is distributed via hashlink (1.11.0+)  - if you have it available in your distro, or build yourself, the game can be launched as `hl egg.hl`
